title: Noise Detector
description: Noise pollution is often overlooked but has significant impacts on health and well-being. Common sources include traffic, industry, construction, and daily urban activities. To manage its effects, noise levels are measured using a sound level meter.

title: Robot Line Follower
description: A Line Follower Robot is an autonomous vehicle that detects and follows a black or white path using infrared (IR) sensors. The sensors, typically composed of IR LEDs and photodiodes, measure surface reflectivity to distinguish the line from the floor. A microcontroller processes this data and controls the motor driver to adjust wheel speed/direction, ensuring accurate path tracking.

title: This IoT-based Smart Chicken Coop System
description: This IoT-based Smart Chicken Coop System successfully provides an intelligent solution for modern farm management by integrating precision control using STM32 and a web-based interface via Raspberry Pi. The system's advantages lie in its ability to provide real-time monitoring through a responsive web interface, reducing reliance on manual supervision, and improving the quality of life for livestock through a consistently optimal environment. With affordable implementation costs and good scalability, this system not only enhances operational efficiency for small-scale farms but also has the potential to be developed into an integrated industrial solution with AI-based predictive technology in the future.
